title: Cloak of Starlight
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|A phosphorescent cloak, woven of pure light beams. The ripples of its folds as the wearer leaps and swerves in combat may dazzle those who gaze on it.}} [[File:Urand starlight.png]] '''''the +1 cloak of Starlight''''' +1 [[cloak]]
can [[Blind|Dazzle]] attackers (20% when dodging an attack)
+4 [[EV]]
[[Stealth]]-- ==Desirability== The '''cloak of Starlight'''{{source ref|0.30.0|art-data.txt|1034}} is usually a very competitive piece of equipment. As a +1 cloak with +4 EV, it will be better than a mundane cloak. The [[Blind#Dazzle|*Dazzle]] effect comes in handy fairly often, especially for evasive characters. The stealth hit is generally not too painful; usually you either have enough stealth that it doesn't matter, or you aren't using stealth at all. [[Stab]]bers might disagree when attempting to take out a sleeping [[unique]], but in other cases the cloak provides a lot of opportunities for low-tier stabs. ==History== *In [[0.26]], the cloak got the *Dazzle property and lost rElec and rC+. *Prior to [[0.19]], the cloak had a +2 enchantment. *Prior to [[0.17]], the cloak had a +0 enchantment and lesser stealth penalty (Stlth-). *Prior to [[0.15]], stealth penalty was -30. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Cloaks]]
